title: [Large-Scale] Flipped Learning-Based Nursing Skill Performance Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of medical terminology and patient care procedures
context.additional_context: Small classroom environments where pre-learning materials are accessible via smartphones but PC environments are unavailable. Conducting practical exercises using real nursing simulation equipment

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic nursing skills (blood pressure measurement, injection administration, etc.) with over 85% accuracy based on OSCE evaluation criteria four weeks later.
Learners can establish and execute weekly learning plans with over 90% implementation rate using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can correct practical errors with 100% peer feedback incorporation through flipped learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
